text: “Nena: “Ine ndekha ndilibe mphamvu yodzibweretsera chabwino kapena kudzichotsera choipa, koma chimene Allah wafuna. Ndikadakhala kuti ndikudziwa za mseri, ndikadadzichulukitsira zabwino, ndipo choipa sichikadandikhudza. Ine sindili chilichonse koma mchenjezi ndi wouza anthu okhulupirira nkhani zabwino.”
